code:
import axios from 'axios'; //library that serves to create HTTP requests that are present externally

const url = "http://localhost:5000/todos";
export const readTodos = () => axios.get(url);
export const createTodo = newTodo => axios.post(url, {
  title: newTodo.title,
  content: newTodo.content,
  url_one: newTodo.url_one,
  url_one_title: String,
  url_one_thumnail: String,
  url_two: newTodo.url_two,
  url_two_title: String,
  url_two_thumnail: String,
  url_three: newTodo.url_three,
  url_three_title: String,
  url_three_thumnail: String,
  content: String,
  url_one: String,
  url_two: String,
  url_two_title: String,
  url_two_thumnail: String,
  url_three: String,
  url_three_title: String,
  url_three_thumnail: String
}); //makes a post request to modify the database

export const updateTodo = (id, updatedTodo) => axios.patch(`${url}/${id}`, updatedTodo);
export const deleteTodo = id => axios.delete(`${url}/${id}`);
